Additional Info:
Multifamily: We have been particularly active on TCO-takeout, value-add, and stabilized floaters. For high quality deals, pricing starts at SOFR + 275.
Industrial: We’ve been very active on construction, lease-up, and mark to market opportunities. We’ve recently closed a sale/leasebacks at below-market rent, mostly vacant recently-delivered industrial, generic lease-up deals, and other mark to market deals.
Residential Condos: ground up condos, multi conversion to condos, and condo inventory loans are a very active space for us.  Some of our biggest loan closings of 2024 have been in this space.
Hotels: We’ve been active on deals with a heavy/standard PIP component, hotels that are ramping off a major renovation, as well as mostly stabilized deals that just aren’t quite ready for permanent debt. Hotel pricing generally starts at +400 (although can be tighter for low leverage).
